name: driver-sensingkit
description: A Databox driver that provides SensingKit mobile sensor data

scripts.release: docker build -t driver-sensingkit . && docker tag driver-sensingkit amar.io:5000/driver-sensingkit && docker push amar.io:5000/driver-sensingkit

author: Yousef Amar <yousef@amar.io> (http://yousefamar.com/)
